info.name: Pipeline Concept - Sample Scenarios
info.description:
This collection helps you to setup and run sample scenarios for the Process Integration Pipeline Concept for Cloud Integration.

We distingush the following scenarios:

- Scenario 1: Recipient List & Interface Split
    
- Scenario 2: Interface Split with Multi Mapping & XI inbound
    
- Scenario 3: Interface Split with Maintain Order at Runtime
    
- Scenario 4: Use Extended Receiver Determination mapping instead of XSLT
    
- Scenario 5: Point-to-Point (Bypass option)
    
- Scenario 6: Point-to-Point with IDoc inbound

item.name: Scenario 1 - RL with IF Split
Map Alternative Partner to Partner ID

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<xsl:stylesheet version="3.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform">
	<xsl:template match="/">
    <ns0:Receivers xmlns:ns0="http://sap.com/xi/XI/System">
     <ReceiverNotDetermined>
       <Type>Error</Type>
       <DefaultReceiver/>
    </ReceiverNotDetermined>
    <xsl:if test="/*:Item/Category = 'Keyboards'">
      <Receiver>
        <Service>{{receiver_1}}</Service>
      </Receiver>
    </xsl:if>
    <xsl:if test="(/*:Item/Category = 'Keyboards') or (/*:Item/Category = 'Software')">
      <Receiver>
        <Service>{{receiver_2}}</Service>
      </Receiver>
    </xsl:if>
    <xsl:if test="(/*:Item/Category = 'Keyboards') and (/*:Item/ProductName != 'XXXX')">
      <Receiver>
        <Service>{{receiver_3}}</Service>
      </Receiver>
    </xsl:if>
    </ns0:Receivers>
	</xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<xsl:stylesheet version="3.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform">
    <xsl:template match="/">
        <ns0:Interfaces xmlns:ns0="http://sap.com/xi/XI/System">
            <xsl:if test="/*:Item/Quantity = '10'">
                <Interface>
                    <Index>1</Index>
                    <Service>/PIP/Step07/Samples/{{scenario}}/{{receiver_1}}/IfIdx1</Service>
                </Interface>
            </xsl:if>
            <xsl:if test="/*:Item/CurrencyCode = 'EUR'">
                <Interface>
                    <Index>2</Index>
                    <Service>/PIP/Step07/Samples/{{scenario}}/{{receiver_1}}/IfIdx2</Service>
                </Interface>
            </xsl:if>
            <xsl:if test="/*:Item/Quantity != '10'">
                <Interface>
                    <Index>3</Index>
                    <Service>/PIP/Step07/Samples/{{scenario}}/{{receiver_1}}/IfIdx3</Service>
                </Interface>
            </xsl:if>
        </ns0:Interfaces>
    </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<xsl:stylesheet version="3.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform">
    <xsl:template match="/">
        <ns0:Interfaces xmlns:ns0="http://sap.com/xi/XI/System">
            <xsl:if test="/*:Item/Quantity = '10'">
                <Interface>
                    <Index>1</Index>
                    <Service>/PIP/Step07/Samples/{{scenario}}/{{receiver_3}}/IfIdx1</Service>
                </Interface>
            </xsl:if>
            <xsl:if test="/*:Item/CurrencyCode = 'EUR'">
                <Interface>
                    <Index>2</Index>
                    <Service>/PIP/Step07/Samples/{{scenario}}/{{receiver_3}}/IfIdx2</Service>
                </Interface>
            </xsl:if>
            <xsl:if test="/*:Item/Quantity != '10'">
                <Interface>
                    <Index>3</Index>
                    <Service>/PIP/Step07/Samples/{{scenario}}/{{receiver_3}}/IfIdx3</Service>
                </Interface>
            </xsl:if>
        </ns0:Interfaces>
    </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

	<xsl:template match="/">

     <ReceiverNotDetermined>
       <Type>Ignore</Type>

    <xsl:if test="(/*:Item/Category = 'Keyboards') or (/*:Item/Category = 'Software')">

item.name: Send Order Software - InboundConversion Error testMode

item.description:
Sample scenario with multiple receivers (Recipient List) and multiple interfaces (Interface Split)

- Receiver determination xpath based on Category and Product Name
- Interface determination xpath based on Quantity and Currency code
- Use receiver specific outbound queue for receiver 1
    
- Use inbound conversion to map from JSON to XML
    
- Use alternative partner to map sender and sender interface to scenario name

item.name: Scenario 2 - IF Split with Multi Mapping
Map Alternative Partner to Partner ID for S1
Map Alternative Partner to Partner ID for S2
Map Alternative Partner to Partner ID for S3

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<xsl:stylesheet version="3.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform">
    <xsl:template match="/">
        <ns0:Receivers xmlns:ns0="http://sap.com/xi/XI/System">
            <ReceiverNotDetermined>
                <Type>Default</Type>
                <DefaultReceiver>
                    <Service>{{receiver_1}}</Service>
                </DefaultReceiver>
            </ReceiverNotDetermined>
            <xsl:if test="/*:Order/Supplier = 'ABCD'">
                <Receiver>
                    <Service>{{receiver_1}}</Service>
                </Receiver>
            </xsl:if>
            <xsl:if test="/*:Order/Supplier != 'ABCD'">
                <Receiver>
                    <Service>{{receiver_2}}</Service>
                </Receiver>
            </xsl:if>
        </ns0:Receivers>
    </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<xsl:stylesheet version="3.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform">
    <xsl:template match="/">
        <ns0:Interfaces xmlns:ns0="http://sap.com/xi/XI/System">
            <xsl:if test="/*:Order/Country = 'DE'">
                <Interface>
                    <Index>1</Index>
                    <Service>/PIP/Step07/Samples/{{scenario}}/{{receiver_1}}/IfIdx1</Service>
                </Interface>
            </xsl:if>
            <xsl:if test="/*:Order/Country != 'DE'">
                <Interface>
                    <Index>2</Index>
                    <Service>/PIP/Step07/Samples/{{scenario}}/{{receiver_1}}/IfIdx2</Service>
                </Interface>
            </xsl:if>
        </ns0:Interfaces>
    </xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

item.name: Send Order ABCD DE - XI Sender S1 Successful

body.raw:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>
<ns0:Order xmlns:ns0="http://demo.sap.com/eip/recipient-list" PurchaseOrderNumber="28001" OrderDate="2019-05-06">
    <Supplier>ABCD</Supplier>
    <Country>DE</Country>
    <Item ItemNumber="10" PurchaseOrderNumber="" OrderDate="">
        <ProductId>HT-1001</ProductId>
        <ProductName>Word</ProductName>
        <Category>Software</Category>
        <Quantity>10</Quantity>
        <CurrencyCode>EUR</CurrencyCode>
        <Price>799.00</Price>
    </Item>
    <Item ItemNumber="20" PurchaseOrderNumber="" OrderDate="">
        <ProductId>HT-1002</ProductId>
        <ProductName>Gaming Keyboard XXL</ProductName>
        <Category>Keyboards</Category>
        <Quantity>4</Quantity>
        <CurrencyCode>EUR</CurrencyCode>
        <Price>100.00</Price>
    </Item>
    <Item ItemNumber="30" PurchaseOrderNumber="" OrderDate="">
            <ProductId>HT-1003</ProductId>
            <ProductName>Lenovo</ProductName>
            <Category>Notebooks</Category>
            <Quantity>2</Quantity>
            <CurrencyCode>EUR</CurrencyCode>
            <Price>899.00</Price>
    </Item>
</ns0:Order>

item.description:
Sample scenario with 1:n message mappings, XI inbound, and sender wildcard

- 1:n message mapping with one single message type items
- 1:n message mapping with two message types header and items
- Use XI protocol on sender side
- Support for wildcard sender via alternative partner
